source.sqlReaderQuery:
select top 100 pac_reg as CD_PESSOA_FISICA, 
pac_nome AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA, 
pac_numcpf AS NR_CPF, 
convert(char(10),pac_nasc,121) as DT_NASCIMENTO, 
pac_fone AS NR_TELEFONE_CELULAR,
pac_fone2 AS NR_TELEFONE, 
emp_cgc as CNPJ ,
EMP_NOME_FANTASIA as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
EMP_RAZ_SOC as MARCA,
pac_pront as NR_PRONTUARIO,
pac_dreg as DT_CADASTRO_ORIGINAL
from pac,
usr,
str,
emp
where PAC_USR_LOGIN_CAD = USR_LOGIN
and USR_STR_COD = str_cod
and STR_EMP_COD = EMP_COD

select top 100
pac_reg as CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
pac_nome as NM_PESSOA_FISICA,
convert(date,osm_dthr) as DT_ENTRADA,
osm_dthr as HR_ENTRADA,
psv_nome as NM_MEDICO,
osm_cnv as CD_CONVENIO,
cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,
convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_ATENDIMENTO,
emp_cgc AS CNPJ,
emp_nome_fantasia as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as CD_PROCEDENCIA,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as DS_PROCEDENCIA,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,

DAY(osm_dthr) as DIA,
MONTH(osm_dthr) as MES, 
YEAR(osm_dthr) as ANO,

OSM_USR_LOGIN_CAD

from osm, pac, cnv, str,  psv, emp
where osm_pac = pac_reg
and osm_cnv = cnv_cod
and osm_str = str_cod
and case when str_emp_cod is null then 1 end = emp_cod
and osm_mreq = psv_cod

-- Construção tabela agenda Smart

select top 10
AGM_PAC as CD_PESSOA_FISICA, 
agm.agm_cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO,
emp_cgc as CNPJ,
CONVERT(DATE,AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA,
CONVERT(TIME,AGM_HINI) AS HORA_AGENDA,
AGM_ATEND AS TIPO_AGENDA,
pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE,
SMK_NOME AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC,
' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC,
1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE,
USR_NOME as NM_USUARIO,
psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO,
AGM_STR_COD as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
AGM_STR_COD as MARCA,
CASE WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A' then 'Aberta'
     WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E' then 'Executada'      
     WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C' then 'Cancelada'     
     WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B' then 'Bloqueada' END STATUS_AGENDA,

convert(varchar,AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(varchar,AGM_OSM_NUM) as NR_ATENDIMENTO,
AGM_num as NR_SEQUENCIA,
''ID,
'' as CD_PROCEDENCIA,
agm_proc as DS_PROCEDENCIA ,
agm.AGM_DTMRC as DT_AGENDAMENTO,
DAY(AGM_HINI) as DIA,
MONTH(AGM_HINI) as MES,
YEAR(AGM_HINI) as ANO,
' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO,
' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO,
agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD as CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO,
agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO as DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO,
agm_med as CD_AGENDA
from 
agm, 
pac,
cnv,
str,
smk,
gcc,
usr,
psv,
emp
where agm.agm_pac = pac_reg
and agm_cnv_cod = cnv_cod
and agm_str_cod = str_cod
and agm_smk = smk_cod
and agm_str_cod = gcc_str_cod
and AGM_USR_LOGIN = USR_LOGIN
and agm_med = PSV_COD
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod

select
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
EMP_NOME_FANTASIA as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
EMP_CGC as CNPJ,
'HOSL' as MARCA
from usr
INNER JOIN str ON str_cod = usr_str_cod
INNER JOIN emp ON emp_cod = str_emp_cod

SELECT top 100
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
DATEFROMPARTS(DATEPART(YYYY, RCL_DTHR_ATUAL),DATEPART(MM, RCL_DTHR_ATUAL),DATEPART(DD, RCL_DTHR_ATUAL)) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONCAT(DATEPART(HH, RCL_DTHR_ATUAL),':',DATEPART(MM, RCL_DTHR_ATUAL)) AS HR_ATUALIZACAO,
CONCAT(RCL_OSM_SERIE,'.',RCL_OSM) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 
RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
RCL_LAUDO_RTF AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
RCL_TXT AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
CASE WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 2 THEN 'HARMONY' WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 1 THEN 'GRUTA' WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 4 THEN 'FUNAV' WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 5 THEN 'PARQUE' ELSE 'PÁTIO' END AS SIGLA_UNIDADE,
CASE WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 2 THEN '12305371000241' WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 1 THEN '12305371000160' WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 4 THEN '12305371000160' WHEN RIGHT(RCL_OSM_SERIE, 1) = 5 THEN '12305371000403' WHEN RCL_OSM_SERIE = ''  THEN '12305371000160' ELSE '12305371000322' END AS CNPJ
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED
WHERE RCL_COD = '32013'

-- Construção tabela agenda Smart

select --top 10
agm_med as CD_AGENDA,
psv_nome AS DS_AGENDA,
' ' CD_TIPO_AGENDA,
psv_cod as CD_PESSOA_FISICA,

emp_cgc as CNPJ,
'' as DS_AREA_ATUACAO, 
'A' as IE_SITUACAO,
EMP_NOME_FANTASIA as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
'HOSL' as MARCA

from 
agm, 
pac,
cnv,
str,
smk,
gcc,
usr,
psv,
emp
where agm.agm_pac = pac_reg
and agm_cnv_cod = cnv_cod
and agm_str_cod = str_cod
and agm_smk = smk_cod
and agm_str_cod = gcc_str_cod
and AGM_USR_LOGIN = USR_LOGIN
and agm_med = PSV_COD
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod

group by agm_med,
psv_nome,
emp_cgc,
psv_cod,
EMP_NOME_FANTASIA
